misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli is a highly accomplished golfer, representing Helsingin Golfklubi, and a regular competitor in the prestigious Hector Trophée.  He possesses a remarkable talent on the course, honed through years of dedicated practice and competition.

Olli's consistent participation in the Hector Trophée, spanning from 2022 to 2025, demonstrates his commitment to the tournament and his skill at the highest levels of the game.  While he’s yet to claim victory in the main event or win the Victor trophy, his presence is always a notable factor.

Beyond his golfing prowess, Olli maintains a fascinating dual career.  He also works as a professional model, balancing the demands of the green with the world of high fashion.  This unique combination adds an interesting dimension to his already captivating profile.

It’s worth noting that few players would dare to give Olli any lip.  His intimidating presence on the course is enhanced by his impressive wrestling skills, a lesser-known talent that adds another layer to his already impressive persona. He is certainly one to watch out for in future tournaments.
